name: Pro Body Boarding
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Pro Bodyboarding lets you decide which waves to ride as you attempt to beat the opposition and perform the wildest tricks, with stunts allowing you to somersault, spin and corkscrew through the barrel of a wave.
The only limit to the stunts you perform is your own courage! With four different beaches to play through, each with their own wave patters and scenery, will you be crazy enough to beat the other boarders?
